name: Power & Revolution
description: In Power & Revolution, become a Head of State of one or several countries of your choice and extend your influence on the world, or play as a legal or illegal opposition leader and get ready for the conquest to power!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10, 8, 7 Processor: 1.6 Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 256MB DirectX 9.0-compatible video card Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10, 8, 7 Processor: 2 Ghz , multi-core processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 3D Video card with 512 mb or more of dedicated VRAM Storage: 4 GB available space

reviews.review_text: Will they ever fix this game ? Overpriced expasion pack in my opinion. It's the same game as Masters of the world, with a few new features and pretty much the same bugs. A country goes to war with me, I retaliated and the people hate me ? Played a dicator I.E Cuba, and I get booted out of office ? I asked for a refund!
